bug_report.title: Incorrect Placement of 'Start' Button

steps_to_reproduce.step: Open the application on a smartphone.
Observe the position of the 'Start' button.

bug_report.expected_result: The 'Start' button should be positioned at the bottom of the screen.
bug_report.actual_result: The 'Start' button is located in the center of the screen.
